levels.levelDescription: The Whispering Shadows level is shrouded in dark-dirt pathways with eerie whispers carrying through the air. Deep-dark-holes dot the landscape, ready to swallow any unsuspecting traveler into the abyss.
Veiled Twilight Grove is adorned with ghostly-platforms floating amidst the dense ambiance. Beware of the mystical water bodies that conceal ancient secrets and potential perils.

At the Sorrowscale Summit, fractured-wall-platforms provide precarious footing as rivers of lava flow ominously. This level is the domain where the Nethermist Whisperer, the legendary sorcerer of darkness, awaits challengers.
